stimulusHtml: Which of the following statements best describes chord 3 ?

features.html: The following question is based on the chord progression below.

choicesHtml: It is a root-position mediant chord that is part of a circle-of-fifths progression.
It is a submediant chord in inversion that results in a deceptive progression.
It is a leading-tone seventh chord in inversion with dominant function.
It is a root-position subdominant chord with predominant function.
